name: Sternfrost Prism
description:
Can only be played if your active character is Cryo Hypostasis: Attach Cryo Crystal Core to them.
After Cryo Hypostasis, who has this card equipped, triggers Cryo Crystal Core: Attach Sheer Cold to the opposing active character.
(Your deck must contain Cryo Hypostasis to add this card to your deck)
descriptionraw: Can only be played if your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2103]</color>: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121034]</color> to them.\nAfter $[A2103], who has this card equipped, triggers <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121034]</color>: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1016]</color> to the opposing active character.\n(Your deck must contain $[A2103] to add this card to your deck)
descriptionreplaced: Can only be played if your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Hypostasis</color>: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystal Core</color> to them.\nAfter Cryo Hypostasis, who has this card equipped, triggers <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystal Core</color>: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sheer Cold</color> to the opposing active character.\n(Your deck must contain Cryo Hypostasis to add this card to your deck)
storytext: Despite its highly stable form and almost machine-like movements, it must still meticulously defend its weak spot...
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Cryo Hypostasis at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas
